Title: Son of the Bride
Actors: Ricardo Darín, Héctor Alterio, Norma Aleandro, Eduardo Blanco
Plot: At age 42, Rafael Belvedere is having a crisis. He lives in the shadow of his father, he feels guilty about rarely visiting his aging mother, his ex-wife says he doesn't spend enough time with their daughter and he has yet to make a commitment to his girlfriend. At his lowest point, a minor heart attack reunites him with Juan Carlos, a childhood friend, who helps Rafael to reconstruct his past and look at the present in new ways.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 35 wins & 11 nominations.
Production: Tornasol Films S.A., Instituto de la Cinematografía y de las Artes Audiovisuales, Patagonik Film Group
